ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.assist.des: Enter sentences and see how they will be parsed by Home Assistant. Each line will be processed as an individual sentence. Intents will not be executed on your instance.
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.debug.debu: Observe requests to the server and responses from the server in browser console.
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.events.sub: Događaj na koji se treba pretplatiti
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.actions.de: The actions dev tool allows you to perform any action available in Home Assistant.
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.actions.ya: Parameters only available in YAML mode
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.actions.ac: This action accepts a target, for example: `entity_id: light.bed_light`
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.actions.no: The UI does not support templates, you can still use the YAML editor.

ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.states.des: Postavite trenutnu vrednost stanja entiteta u okviru Home Assistant.
Ako entitet pripada uređaju, neće biti stvarne komunikacije sa tim uređajem.
Šabloni se prikazuju pomoću Jinja2 sa nekim proširenjima specifičnim za Home Assistant.
Do you want to reset your current template back to the demo template?
Do you want to clear your current template?
Ovaj šablon se ažurira na početku svakog minuta.
Ovaj šablon osluškuje sve događaje promenjene stanjem.
Ovaj šablon ne oslušku događaje i neće se automatski ažurirati.
Ovaj šablon osluškuje sledeće stanja promenjena događajem:

Info
Fix issue
Fixing this issue is not supported yet.
Entity has no state
''{name}'' ({statistic_id}) has no state at the moment, if this is an orphaned entity, you may want to delete the long term statistics of it from your database.
Do you want to permanently delete the long term statistics of {statistic_id} from your database?
Entity is not recorded
State changes of ''{name}'' ({statistic_id}) are not recorded, therefore, we cannot track long term statistics for it.
You probably excluded this entity, or have just included some entities.
See the recorder documentation for more information.
Entity is no longer recorded
We have generated statistics for ''{name}'' ({statistic_id}) in the past, but state changes of this entity are no longer recorded, therefore, we cannot track long term statistics for it anymore.
You probably excluded this entity, or have just included some entities.
See the recorder documentation for more information.
If you no longer wish to keep the long term statistics recorded in the past, you may delete them now.
The entity no longer has a state class
We have generated statistics for ''{name}'' ({statistic_id}) in the past, but it no longer has a state class, therefore, we cannot track long term statistics for it anymore.
Statistics cannot be generated until this entity has a supported state class.
If the state class was previously provided by an integration, this might be a bug. Please report an issue.
If you previously set the state class yourself, please correct it.
The different state classes and when to use which can be found in the developer documentation.
If the state class has permanently been removed, you may want to delete the long term statistics of it from your database.
Do you want to permanently delete the long term statistics of {statistic_id} from your database?
Jedinica ovog entiteta je promenjena
Ažurirajte jedinicu istorijskih statističkih vrednosti sa ''{metadata_unit}'' u ''{state_unit}'', bez konverzije.
Izbriši sve stare statističke podatke za ovaj entitet
How do you want to fix this issue?
The unit of ''{name}'' ({statistic_id}) changed to ''{current_unit}'' which can't be converted to the previously stored unit, ''{previous_unit}''.
If the historic statistic values have a wrong unit, you can update the units of the old values. The values will not be updated.
Otherwise you can choose to delete all historic statistic values, and start over.

ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.yaml.title: YAML
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.yaml.secti: Osnovna provera konfiguracije se automatski vrši pre ponovnog pokretanja. Osnovna provera validacije obezbeđuje da YAML konfiguracija nema grešaka koje će sprečiti pokretanje Home Assistant ili bilo koje integracije. Takođe je moguće uraditi samo osnovnu proveru validnosti bez ponovnog pokretanja.
Konfiguracija neće sprečiti pokretanje Home Assistant!
Neki delovi Home Assistant mogu se ponovo učitati bez potrebe za ponovnim pokretanjem. Klikom na jednu od dole navedenih opcija će se osloboditi njihova trenutna YAML konfiguracija i učitati novu.
Grupe, grupni entiteti i servisi obaveštavanja
Ulaz datumski i vremenski: date times
Da li stvarno želite da zaustavite Home Assistant?
Ponovno pokretanje Home Assistant nije uspelo
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.services.a: Ovaj servis prihvata cilj, na primer: `entity_id: light.bed_light`
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.services.d: Razvojna alatka za programere vam omogućava da pozovete bilo koji dostupan servis u Home Assistant.
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.services.n: Korisnički interfejs ne podržava šablone, i dalje možete da koristite YAML uređivač.
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.services.y: Parametri dostupni samo u YAML režimu
